body:
School transmutation

Level alchemist 1, bard 1, inquisitor 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner 1

Duration 1 minute/level

Saving Throw none

Spell Resistance no

Target Restrictions personal

The target of a wordspell with this effect word has its base land speed increased by 30 feet for the duration of this effect word.
name: Dash
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Time Words/Dash
